content: --पादः {1} any one of the four stages of a legal proceeding; these are four: --(1) पूर्वपक्ष, the plaint; (2) उत्तरपक्ष the defence; (3) क्रियापाद adducing evidence, oral or written; (4) निर्णयपाद, the decision or verdict. {2} the fourth stage; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} निर्णयपाद, that part which concerns the verdict or decision.
